text:
It seemed to me that, were I a gentleman like him, I
would take to my bosom only such a wife as I could love; but the very obviousness of the advantages to the husband’s own happiness offered by this plan convinced me that there must be arguments against its general adoption of which I was quite ignorant: otherwise I felt sure all the world would act as I wished to act.
trans:
Il me semblait que, si j'étais un gentleman comme lui, je
ne prendrais pour femme que celle que je pourrais aimer ; mais la clarté des avantages que ce plan offrait au bonheur du mari me convainquit qu'il devait y avoir des arguments contre son adoption générale, dont j'étais complètement ignorant : sinon, je n'avais aucun doute que tout le monde agirait comme je souhaitais agir.
